name: Unidentified_Nikto_protector
content:
An unidentified Nikto worked as a guard for the information broker Jib Kopatha on Void Station during the early parts of the Galactic Civil War.
In 0 ABY, a few months after the Battle of Yavin, the Darth Vader visited Void Station, in order to extract information from Kopatha about the Rebel Alliance's whereabouts. The Bothan claimed that gaining such information were very hard to find, which caused Vader to put pressure on him by using The Force to choke him.
Kopatha's guards tried to intervene, charging towards Vader. The Nikto was knocked unconscious, when the Sith Lord threw him into a wall.
